titles.title: CB 185 Behold What Manner Of Love

properties.copyright: 1978 Maranatha! Music / CCCM Music, Administered by Maranatha! Music

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Behold what manner of love
The Father has given unto us
Behold what manner of love
The Father has given unto us

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That we should be called
The sons of God
That we should be called
The sons of God
